name: Blonk
description: Blonk Group is a talent acquisition firm with a unique approach to helping companies attract, select and retain the right people. We are international, based in Paris, Singapore and Silicon Valley. Our talent acquisition solutions are powered by an AI-based recruitment platform designed to address hurdles in recruiting. Created by recruitment experts for HR & Hiring Managers, our innovative digital search solutions help companies create a competitive edge through Talent Acquisition. ABOUT BLONK APP Created in Silicon Valley at the end of 2014, Blonk app is a mobile recruitment and networking platform inspired by love matching principles. Using AI and video, Blonk helps the right talents and hiring leaders find each other across geographies in a few swipes. Talents get a chance to express their unique style and potential through video. Hiring leaders can also record their profile to attract the best people.

enhanced_description: Blonk Group is an international talent acquisition firm with offices in Paris, Singapore, and Silicon Valley. They offer a unique approach to helping companies attract, select, and retain talent, with a particular focus on Top Executives. Their talent acquisition solutions are powered by an AI-based recruitment platform, known as the Blonk app. Launched in 2014, the Blonk app functions as a mobile recruitment and networking platform, inspired by 'love matching principles,' using AI and video to connect talents and hiring leaders across geographies through a 'Tinder-like' swiping experience. Talents can express their unique style and potential through video, while hiring leaders can also record their profiles to attract the best candidates. Beyond the app, Blonk also provides an intuitive Engagement & Tracking System (ETS) called SOblonk to manage executive talent pools, aiming to improve hiring efficiency, quality of hire, and hiring speed.
